com.lib_im.pro.utils

类 GlideRequest<TranscodeType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder<TranscodeType>
      • com.lib_im.pro.utils.GlideRequest<TranscodeType>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class GlideRequest<TranscodeType>
extends com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder<TranscodeType>
    Contains all public methods from RequestBuilder, all options from RequestOptions and all generated options from GlideOption in annotated methods in GlideExtension annotated classes.

    Generated code, do not modify.

    另请参阅:
    RequestBuilder, RequestOptions
